message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_DATA_HUB
message.locale: %1s - ConcernRole %2n attempted an unauthorized access of data belonging to %3n.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_DATA_HUB_NON_LINKED_USER
message.locale: %1s - Non linked external user %2s is attempting to use the Data Hub.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_GENERATED_PDF
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted an unauthorized access of the Generated PDF belonging to %3s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_PUBLIC_CITIZEN_BAD_PASSWORD
message.locale: %1s - Attempt to lock out public citizen user with bad password.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_PUBLIC_CITIZEN_UNAUTHORISED_METHOD_INVOKATION
message.locale: %1s - Public Citizen Citizen Workspace account attempted to invoke the method %2s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_UNLINKED_USER_UNAUTHORISED_METHOD_INVOKATION
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to invoke method %3s. This user is not a Linked Citizen Workspace User.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_METHOD_INVOKATION_FOR_INCORRECT_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to invoke method %3s for Participant with ConcernRoleID of %4s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_INCORRECT_CITIZEN_SESSION_REQUESTED
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to retrieve the Citizen Session for user %3s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_UNAUTHORISED_READ_OF_INTAKE_PROGRAM_APPLICATION
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to access an IntakeProgramApplication submitted by %3s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_INVALID_METHOD_PARAMETER
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to access method %3s with an invalid method parameter.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_INCORRECT_CITIZEN_SCRIPT_INFO_REQUESTED
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to access a CitizenScriptInfo with a username of %3s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_INCORRECT_EXTERNAL_PAYMENT_REQUESTED
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to access an ExternalPayment associated to an account with a username of %3s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_INCORRECT_EXTERNAL_PAYMENT_BREAKDOWN_REQUESTED
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to access an ExternalPaymentBreakdown associated to an account with a username of %3s.

message.name: SECURITY_VIOLATION_METHOD_INVOCATION_FOR_INCORRECT_USER
message.locale: %1s - User %2s attempted to invoke method %3s for user %4s.

message.name: SECURITY_ENCRYPTION_ERROR
message.locale: %1s - An encryption error was encountered while performing SecurityStrategy invocation in Citizen Workspace %2s.
